title: The Favorites - College Football Best Bets with JBoy and Collin Wilson | BONUS EPISODE
itunes:title: The Favorites - College Football Best Bets with JBoy and Collin Wilson | BONUS EPISODE
description:
One of the final full slates of college football kicks off this Saturday, so Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of the Action Network welcome two very special guests to the show for a special bonus episode! First, their sports handicapper colleague Collin Wilson of the Action Network. And last but certainly not least is Jake "JBoy" Crain, host of the Volume's red-hot college football podcast "The JBoy Show," and one of the fastest-rising personalities in the game today. Together they talk College Football Playoff odds, Heisman Trophy winners, their favorite plays on the Saturday board, and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
